summary: A middle-aged, single mother of three cares for her eighty year old father, and they are pushed to the breaking point.
cast: Néstor Guzzini|Jorge Temponi|Fernando Amaral|Roxana Blanco|Oscar Pernas|Martín Despaux|Christina Techera|Julieta Gentile|Fernanda Fraga|Andrea Fantoni|Gustavo Gonzalez|Raul Scarone|Schubert Bacigalu|Laura Baez|Cecilia Baranda|Christian Casanol|Leonardo Pintos|Thiago Segovia|Emilia Díaz|Nelly Notari|Maria Noel Gutierrez|Carlos Vallarino|Alicia Alfonso|Diego Noble|Enrique Napole|Maria Laura Castro|Facundo Segovia|Bruno Amichini|Daniel Arocha|Ernesto Liotti|Sara De Los Santos|Sergio Chapparro|Daniel Gini
title: La demora
